params._l2GasLimit: Gas limit for relaying messages to L2.

relayMessage(address,bytes).details: This message is marked payable because relaying the message will require a fee that needs to be propagated to the Scroll Bridge. It will not send msg.value to the target contract on L2.

params.target: L2 address to send message to.

relayTokens(address,address,uint256,addr.details: This method is marked payable because relaying the message might require a fee to be paid by the sender to forward the message to L2. However, it will not send msg.value to the target contract on L2.
